name: V7
slogan: Instruments of creation for visual intelligence - V7 develops ways of making AI learn

team.name: Alberto Rizzoli
team.bioHtml: Founder @V7 • Worked at @Google, @Intesa San Paolo Group

team.title: Senior Deep Learning Engineer
team.name: Andrea Azzini
team.bioHtml: I am a Senior Deep Learning Engineer at @V7, where I work to simplify Vision AI

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer - Vision AI Platform
jobs.description:
Create the world's most advanced tools to build state of the art vision AI in highly impactful areas. Your work will be used in cancer research, life-saving early stage medical analysis, advanced manufacturing, and green agro-tech as part of V7's growing network of high-impact partnerships.

Join a team of 8 high caliber engineers with the goal of enabling the creation of easily trainable human-like image recognition. Our main product, V7 Darwin, is a software suite used by Fortune 100 companies to label and train state of the art neural networks for image recognition.
 
As a full-stack developer at V7, you have good or excellent knowledge of Elixir (or Erlang), as well as some front end experience in Vue.js or a similarly modern framework. This is a full-time position in the heart of London reporting to the CTO.

Read more at:
https://v7labs.com/working-at-v7

Requirements:

- A proven interest in computer science from a young age and strong portfolio of projects.
- Basic familiarity with deep learning (what it's used for, what does it require).
- 4 years or more of hands-on programming experience, either working or during university.
- Strong experience with functional programming. Proven Elixir experience.
- A curious, scientific mind.
- Open to international travel for conferences, demos. 
- Fluent in English


Perks & Benefits:
- Unlimited vacation, just tell us when you need time off.
- Paid tickets, accommodation, and travel to relevant conferences, nationally or internationally (NIPS, ICCV, CVPR, [...]) to expand your network & knowledge.
- Yearly 4-day company retreats in stunning locations.
- Central office in front of Victoria Station with standing desks & 4K monitors.
- Unlimited high-quality coffee, tea, snacks, and other comforts.
- An early presence in the company and the chance to have a lasting impact on our work.

jobs.title: Front End Web Developer - Vision AI Platform
jobs.description:
https://www.v7labs.com/working-at-v7

V7 Darwin is an online platform for the annotation, training, and deployment of deep neural networks for image recognition. We're creating AI that learns on its own with minimal need of human supervision, and this requires an intuitive interface to minimally guide an AI's learning.

As a Front End Developer at V7, you will be developing Darwin's front-end alongside our Elixir Back-End developers. You are proficient with working alongside design tools like Figma and are excited by challenges such as rendering labels, annotations, an AI output on images and video of various nature. You have experience with Vue.js or similar toolkits, and a proven record of working with highly interactive web platform.

Darwin poses several challenges from a web development perspective, from loading datasets containing millions of images, to displaying medical imaging in a canvas which may be over 100,000 pixels squared in size. This role is for an experienced developer seeking a challenge in a competitive engineering startup.

Requirements:

- A proven interest in computer science from a young age and a history of developing challenging side projects.

- A basic understanding of what Deep Learning is from a high-level.

- 3 years or more of hands-on developer experience, either working or during university.

- Strong experience with Vue js or similar frameworks.

- Fluent in English

-------

Perks & Benefits:

- Unlimited vacation, just tell us when you need time off.

- Paid tickets, accommodation, and travel to relevant conferences, nationally or internationally (NIPS, ICCV, CVPR, [...]) to expand your network & knowledge.

- Yearly 4-day company retreats in stunning locations.

- Central office in front of Victoria Station with standing desks & 4K monitors.

- Unlimited high-quality coffee, tea, snacks, and other comforts.

- An early presence in the company and the chance to have a lasting impact on our work, in a novel application of DL within one of the most impactful fields.


This is a full-time position in central London, joining a high caliber engineering team of 8.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
https://www.v7labs.com/working-at-v7

V7 Darwin is an online platform for the annotation, training, and deployment of deep neural networks for image recognition. We're creating AI that learns on its own with minimal need of human supervision, and this requires an intuitive interface to minimally guide an AI's learning.

As a Front End Developer at V7, you will be developing Darwin's front-end alongside our Elixir Back-End developers. You are proficient with working alongside design tools like Figma and are excited by challenges such as rendering labels, annotations, an AI output on images and video of various nature. You have experience with Vue.js or similar toolkits, and a proven record of working with highly interactive web platform.

Darwin poses several challenges from a web development perspective, from loading datasets containing millions of images, to displaying medical imaging in a canvas which may be over 100,000 pixels squared in size. This role is for an experienced developer seeking a challenge in a competitive engineering startup.

Requirements:

  • A proven interest in computer science from a young age and a history of developing challenging side projects.

  • A basic understanding of what Deep Learning is from a high-level.

  • 3 years or more of hands-on developer experience, either working or during university.

  • Strong experience with Vue js or similar frameworks.

  • Fluent in English

Perks & Benefits:

  • Unlimited vacation, just tell us when you need time off.

  • Paid tickets, accommodation, and travel to relevant conferences, nationally or internationally (NIPS, ICCV, CVPR, [...]) to expand your network & knowledge.

  • Yearly 4-day company retreats in stunning locations.

  • Central office in front of Victoria Station with standing desks & 4K monitors.

  • Unlimited high-quality coffee, tea, snacks, and other comforts.

  • An early presence in the company and the chance to have a lasting impact on our work, in a novel application of DL within one of the most impactful fields.

This is a full-time position in central London, joining a high caliber engineering team of 8.

jobs.title: Back End Developer - Vision AI Platform
jobs.description:
https://www.v7labs.com/working-at-v7

V7 Darwin is an online platform for the annotation, training, and deployment of deep neural networks for image recognition. Its goal is to fundamentally change the way AI is developed and make it drastically easier to create human-like sight by enabling AI models to learn with minimal human input.
V7's work touches area like early stage cancer detection, autonomous manufacturing, and environmental monitoring of the planet, all through computer vision.
 
As a back end developer at V7, you have good or excellent knowledge of Elixir (or functional programming in general). You will be working on the components that enable AI training data to be labelled, viewed, and ultimately fed into a deep learning framework. This is a full-time position in the heart of London reporting to the CTO.

Read more at:
https://v7labs.com/working-at-v7

Requirements:

- A proven interest in computer science from a young age and a propensity to develop challenging side projects.
- Basic familiarity with deep learning (what it's used for, what does it require).
- 4 years or more of hands-on programming experience, either working or during university.
- Strong experience with functional programming. Proven Elixir or Erlang experience.
- A curious, scientific mind.
- Open to international travel for conferences, demos. 
- Fluent in English


Perks & Benefits:
- Unlimited vacation, just tell us when you need time off.
- Paid tickets, accommodation, and travel to relevant conferences, nationally or internationally (NIPS, ICCV, CVPR, [...]) to expand your network & knowledge.
- Yearly 4-day company retreats in stunning locations.
- Central office in front of Victoria Station with standing desks & 4K monitors.
- Unlimited high-quality coffee, tea, snacks, and other comforts.
- An early presence in the company and the chance to have a lasting impact on our work.
